name: Hunted Birds (ETPA Montpellier)
description: Hunted Birds is a 2D platformer developed with the framework Phaser 3. The main character, Papaye, who left his nest to bring back food for his future children. On his way back to its little home, he was hurt on his wing by a human weapon shooting. He survived and even came back at his nest to realize that his eggs were stolen. He linked his injury with the theft of his eggs. He decided to go for an adventure to bring back his eggs. However he’ll quickly realize that the people who stole his eggs are not the same that hurt him. Indeed, the ‘eggs’s thieves’ acted to protect that species before hunters (who hurt Papaye) try to steal the eggs and sell them.
